title: Swift Industries Gemini Cargo Pack
content:
Switch Industries just announced its newest bag, the Gemini Cargo Pack ($70). Read on for more information.

The Gemini Cargo Pack is built around a rigid canister design, allowing for secure attachment to your favorite 3-boss cargo cage. To ensure the pack doesn’t rotate or twist in the cargo cage, the pack features hypalon-reinforced velcro attachment straps.

Specified to fit a 1L camping cookset and propane canister. On either side of the outside of the bag, vertical webbing daisy-chains serve as useful attachment points for items such as a small pump, or to lace shock cord into an exterior cargo net.

The Gemini Fork Bag is made from Challenge ECOPAK, a 100% recycled polyester. Dimensions: 5” Diameter X 9” Tall

Specs

  • Measurements: 5″ diameter 9” tall, plus 8.5” roll top Capacity: 3L to 4L
  • Weight: 0.55 lbs/8.7 oz
  • Challenge RBC1680 Ballistic along back panel for exceptional abrasion resistance
  • Fully lined with 400D nylon packcloth
  • Fastex side release buckle
  • Auxilary attachment daisy chain webbing strips
  • Coverlight-backed omniwrap velcro attachment straps for attachment to
  • Fork Cage HDPE body insert for structure and stability regardless of what you’re packing
  • Made in Surabaya, Indonesia out of recycled materials.

See more at Swift Industries.

The post Swift Industries Gemini Cargo Pack appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
